text: Titus Buberník (12 October 1933 - 27 March 2022) was a Slovak football midfielder. He played for the Czechoslovakia national team in 23 matches and scored 5 goals between 1958 until 1963. He was born in Pusté Úľany, Czechoslovakia. Buberník died on 27 March 2022 at the age of 88.Smutná nedeľa nášho futbalu, na večnosť odišiel Titus Buberník ==References== == Other websites == * ČMFS entry Category:1933 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Slovak footballers
title: Titus Buberník
